definition: halfway up a mountain/lit. waist of mountain
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: There, the snow mountain depressions is our goal.
sentences.chinese: 在那里，那片雪多山腰洼地是我们的目标。

sentences.english: The clouds lingering over the mountainside and the fog often surround us.
sentences.chinese: 云雾旋绕在山腰，自己们经常被年夜雾所覆盖。

sentences.english: The former as a target of mountainside depressions, now has established a milepost.
sentences.chinese: 那昔日当作目标的山腰洼地，而今已树立起里程碑。

sentences.english: The East Village tip, 1002 meters above sea level, the hillside village head.
sentences.chinese: 东面有寨头尖，海拔1002米，山腰为寨头岭。

sentences.english: The wind before the storm fills the mountainside tower.
sentences.chinese: 暴雨前的风灌满了山腰上的塔楼。

sentences.english: Soon the whole hillside was one gigantic, seething, cretin, mongolian and pinhead orgy.
sentences.chinese: 不久整个山腰都沸腾了，白痴，弱智，畸形一起狂欢。

sentences.english: On the half way some of them were too tired to go on. They suggested going back.
sentences.chinese: 到了半山腰，有的人累得不想再爬了，他们建议回去。

sentences.english: Their house is half-way down the hill.
sentences.chinese: 他们的房子坐落在半山腰。

sentences.english: Truku refers to a mountain plateau or a place suitable for living.
sentences.chinese: 太鲁阁，意指山腰的平台或可居住之地。

sentences.english: There is a small evergreen shrub on the hillside.
sentences.chinese: 山腰上有一小块常绿灌木丛。

sentences.english: It was a steep climb, so we rested for a while halfway up the hill.
sentences.chinese: 因山势高峻，乃在山腰休息片时。

sentences.english: Passing the green tea field at the waist of Flower Tip Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 路过花尖山腰的绿油油的茶场。

sentences.english: After you mended your sons' clothes torn by hillside thorns.
sentences.chinese: 你补好了儿子们的为山腰的荆棘扯破的衣服之后。

sentences.english: The greenery has completely overwhelmed the ruins of an old hotel on the mountainside.
sentences.chinese: 山腰上有一处原来的酒店几乎被绿色完全包围了。

sentences.english: From our house on the hillside, we can overlook the whole of the harbour.
sentences.chinese: 从我们在山腰的房子里，我们能俯瞰这港口的全景。

sentences.english: We should always strive to leave no trace on the rock face or the mountainside.
sentences.chinese: 我们应当始终力求不在岩壁与山腰上留下任何痕迹。

definition: Shanshang township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
